attributes.action: Help the LGBT community of Chechnya and stop this concentration camp
attributes.background: Chechnya have opened a concentration camp for people of the LGBT community, they are being tortured by electric chair to give names of other members of the LGBT community in Chechnya, 3 people have so far been murdered! This is barbaric and we must stand together to stop this gay purge!

rejection.details: You could start petition asking the UK Government to put diplomatic pressure on Chechnya to close these camps, or to impose sanctions, or to intervene militarily, or some other action in response to the events your petition highlights.
